title: Commissioners of the Provedores dos Concelhos
body: They existed in 1834, by virtue of an order from the Prefect of the Province, but they lasted a short time. They performed police functions in the parishes and had the police sergeants under their orders.

1834: There were commissioners of the Provedores dos Concelhos by virtue of an order from the Prefect of the Province, but they lasted a short time.
